name: Transient Station
description:
Best in show overall for the 2017 A&M SIGGRAPH Gigajam.

made in 36 hours by a team of 4.

Originally made as a VR experience, Transient Station is a small game about helping people find what they are looking for so they can move on.

(basically a matching game)

Navigate your desk area and try and serve the needs of the customers.
